name: Shady Ghostie's Mystery (ysong)
description:
In this game, you play as a ghost who have died recently, but he has no recollection of how he died, and the reason why he died.

Along the way, he will need to discover various clues in order to regain his memory. At the same time, he will have to avoid the Grim Reaper that's after him to take him to hell.

What actually happened? What is the reason why he is going to hell? How did he died? Or more importantly, why?

Click Play to find out the answers :)

How to Play:

  • The ghost will follow the mouse poistion!
  • Press "I" to inspect
  • Press "Space" to continue the dialogue
  • Left mouse click and hold to drag. Some items can be dragged to discover hidden items!
  • Press "H" to hide from the Grim Reaper
  • The music will change when the Grim Reaper is incoming, listen carefully!
  • Hiding spots are indicated by a shiba inu doll within its proximity
